title: 萌新求助，整合包经常跳出
author: aixingqiu
txt_content: 下了个1.14的整合包，进去更换材质的时候就特别容易崩溃闪退

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
aixingqiu 发表于 2020-3-20 20:07
-- Resource location being registered --
Details:
Resource location: minecraft:textures/entity/zombi ...
整合包的 mod 有些老了，换成这个整合包 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=869469

replies.author: aixingqiu
replies.txt_content:
